name: Nikakudori Reborn FREE
description:
Using the classic puzzle game Mahjong tiles.
"Nikakudori Reborn" - FREE Edition
- Free version limitations -
1.GameLevel "Normal"level only.
2."Mahjong" tiles only.

- Full Version "Nikakudori Reborn" -
1.Three levels of game: "Easy","Normal","Hard"
2.Four kind tiles
3.Managing multiple players score
